channel.title: Radiocarbon dating, calibration and sequencing on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in Radiocarbon dating, calibration and sequencing on open-archaeo

item.title: 14C-power-sensitivity
item.description: How wrong is wrong and how good can it get? 14C chronological model power and sensitivity analyses with OxCal and R.

item.title: aDRAC
item.description: The Archive des datations radiocarbones d’Afrique centrale (archive for radiocarbon datings from Central Africa, aDRAC) provides a catalogue of available radiocarbon dates from Central Africa. The data cover published radiocarbon dates and essential metadata for each date as well as available references.

item.title: AIDA
item.description: Dataset of 4,010 radiocarbon dates from Italy from Late Mesolithic until Late Antiquity.

item.title: Analysing-Archaeological-Radiocabon-Ages-Using-R
item.description: Practice some techniques for analysing archaeological radiocabon ages using R.

item.title: ArchaeoCal
item.description: An R Interface to OxCal.

item.title: ArchaeoData
item.description: Models and data to reproduce results from ArchaeoPhases examples and vignettes.

item.title: baydem
item.description: Bayesian tools for reconstructing past demography.

item.title: Bchron
item.description: Radiocarbon Dating, Age-Depth Modelling, Relative Sea Level Rate Estimation, and Non-Parametric Phase Modelling

item.title: c14
item.description: R package for tidy radiocarbon data.

item.title: c14-date-extractor
item.description: Script for extracting c14 dates from text.

item.title: c14-laboratory-code
item.description: List of all past and present radiocarbon laboratory codes known to have been used in published references.

item.title: calibrator
item.description: Small command line tool for 14C calibration.

item.title: CalPal-Database
item.description: CalPal 14C-Database created by Bernhard Weninger (Universität zu Köln) as part of the CalPal software package. This repository serves as an interface to access the data more easily.

item.title: carbon14
item.description: The goal of carbon14 is to provide a tidy interface to radiocarbon dating, to promote its inclusion in reproducible manuscripts

item.title: caribbean-14C
item.description: A compilation of anthropogenic radiocarbon dates for the Caribbean region.

item.title: cleanc14
item.description: Provides some utility functions for cleaning radiocarbon data in R.

item.title: clustering_14C
item.description: A python implementation of the method of clustering radiocarbon dates in order to determine whether they represent separate events, or phases in time

item.title: coffee
item.description: Uses Bayesian methods to enforce the chronological ordering of radiocarbon and other dates.

item.title: demjanp
item.description: Radiocarbon Dating Resolution Calculator.

item.title: IntCal
item.description: The IntCal20 radiocarbon calibration curves are provided here in a single data package, together with previous IntCal curves and postbomb curves.

item.title: IOSACal
item.description: IOSACal is an open source tool for radiocarbon calibration

item.title: neolithicR
item.description: Shiny app to search and filter radiocarbon dates from various source databases, based on the R package c14bazAAR.

item.title: NERD
item.description: Dataset of 10,647 radiocarbon dates from the Near East from the Late Pleistocene until the Late Holocene (ca. 14 - 2 kya BP).

item.title: nimbleCarbon
item.description: The nimbleCarbon package provides utility functions and bespoke probability distributions for the Bayesian analyses of radiocarbon dates using the NIMBLE framework. The package is particularly dedicated to demographic inferences based on changing frequencies of radiocarbon dates.

item.title: oxcAAR
item.description: A collection of functions that can be used to execute OxCal from within R.

item.title: p2pPerm
item.description: A function for retrieving metrics for resistance-resilience from rcarbon permTest objects.

item.title: p3k14c
item.description: Global archaeological radiocarbon dataset

item.title: p3k14c-data-scrubbing
item.description: Scrubbing program for the global archaeological radiocarbon dataset

item.title: radon
item.description: Backend for one of the largest 14C-Database online.

item.title: rapanui-radiocarbon
item.description: A repository of radiocarbon data for Rapa Nui.

item.title: rbacon
item.description: A package for Bayesian age-depth modelling of sediment cores, constrained by prior information on sedimentation rates and their variability.

item.title: rcarbon
item.description: Methods for calibrating and analysing radiocarbon dates

item.title: recmod
item.description: Tools for estimating parameters for Radiocarbon-dated Event Count (REC) Models.

item.title: rintchron
item.description: rintchron provides an R interface to IntChron, an indexing service and exchange format for chronological data such as radiocarbon dates.

item.title: rxpand
item.description: Radiocarbon dates for the spread of farming and ceramics in tropical South America.

item.title: spDates
item.description: Analysis of spatial gradients in radiocarbon dates.

item.title: xronos.R
item.description: A worldwide database of chronological information from archaeological contexts, including radiocarbon and dendrochronological data.
